name: Kohler Vibrant Brushed Nickel Soap Dispenser - 16 oz.
description: This Kohler Soap/Lotion Dispenser, finished in a vibrant brushed nickel, allows you to customize your sink. It holds up to 16 oz. of liquid soap or lotion and has a removable top for simple refilling. It features durable brass construction and can be directly installed to pre-drilled sink or surface holes.Holds up to 16 ounces of soap or lotion; refillable from topSolid-brass constructionMay be installed in predrilled sink holes, or surfaces up to 2 inches thickRetail availability onlyCoordinates with transitional-style faucetsCoordinates with KOHLER Forte and other transitional style faucetsAvailable exclusively at The Home Depot
